source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW staff_cost

     AS

SELECT
    h.pers_no as staff_number,
    h.ps_group as grade, 
	h.annual_salary as salary, 
    cast(cast(h.annual_salary as float)/(365.0*7.4) as float) as hourly_rate,
    le.ExpectedFrom as report_month_end_date,
    le.LeaveDaysPerYear as leave_allowance,
    cast(case sign(datediff(day, cast(le.LeaveYearStart as date), le.expectedfrom))
				when 1 then le.LeaveYearStart
				when 0 then le.LeaveYearStart
				else dateadd(year, -1, le.LeaveYearStart)
			end as date) as leave_start_date,
    le.leavedaysperyear*(1 - abs((((datediff(day, cast(
                                                    CASE sign(datediff(day, cast(le.leaveyearstart AS date), le.expectedfrom))
                                                    WHEN 1 THEN
                                                    le.leaveyearstart
                                                    ELSE dateadd(year, -1, le.leaveyearstart)
                                                    END
                                                    AS date), le.expectedfrom))/364.25)%1))) AS expected_leave_hours_remaining
    
FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.pers_no = case left(cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10)), 1)
                                                            when 4 then '50' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                            when 5 then '00' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                            else cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                        end
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Annual Leave / P&P';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW carried_over
    
    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    h.pers_no as staff_number,
    case sign(le.LeaveDaysPerYear - 148)
        when 1 then 148
        when 0 then 148
        else le.LeaveDaysPerYear
    end as carried_over_hours

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.pers_no = case left(cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10)), 1)
                                                                            when 4 then '50' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                                            when 5 then '00' + cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                                            else cast(le.EmployeeID as varchar(10))
                                                                        end
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Brought Forward';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leave_taken

     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    h.pers_no as staff_number,
    sum(f.Hours) as leave_hours_taken

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim f ON h.pers_no = f.EmployeeID
LEFT JOIN staff_cost l ON f.EmployeeID = l.staff_number
LEFT JOIN carried_over co ON f.EmployeeID = co.staff_number
WHERE 
    f.AbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
    -- AND 
    -- f.AbsenceStartDate BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND '@file_date' -- or may be AbsenceEndDate
GROUP BY 
    h.pers_no;

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW sap_hr_historic

     AS
	 
SELECT DISTINCT
	h.pers_no,
	h.first_name,
	h.last_name,
	h.employee_no,
	h.cocd,
	h.company_code,
	h.pa,
	h.personnel_area,
	h.psubarea,
	h.personnel_subarea,
	h.org_unit,
	h.organizational_unit,
	h.organizational_key1,
	h.organizational_key2,
	h.workc,
	h.work_contract,
	h.ct,
	h.contract_type,
	h.ps_group,
	h.pay_band_description,
	h.fte,
	h.wk_hrs,
	h.indicator_part_time_employee,
	h.s,
	h.employment_status,
	h.gender_key,
	h.tra_start_date,
	h.tra_end_date,
	h.tra_status,
	h.tra_grade,
	h.prev_persno,
	h.actr,
	h.reason_for_action,
	h.position,
	h.position_1,
	h.cost_ctr,
	h.cost_centre,
	h.civil_service_start,
	h.date_to_current_job,
	h.seniority_date,
	h.date_to_subst_grade,
	h.pers_no_1,
	h.name_of_manager_om,
	h.manager_position,
	h.manager_position_text,
	h.counter_sign_manager,
	h.loc,
	h.location,
	h.org_start_date,
	h.fix_term_end_date,
	h.loan_start_date,
	h.loan_end_date,
	h.eegrp,
	h.employee_group,
	h.annual_salary,
	h.curr,
	h.ni_number,
	h.birth_date,
	h.age_of_employee,
	h.eo,
	h.ethnic_origin,
	h.nid,
	h.rel,
	h.religious_denomination_key,
	h.sxo,
	h.wage_type,
	h.employee_subgroup,
	h.loa_abs_type,
	h.loa_absence_type_text,
	h.scheme_reference,
	h.pension_scheme_name,
	h.disability_code,
	h.disability_text,
	h.disability_code_description,
	h.parea,
	h.payroll_area,
	h.assignment_number,
	h.fte_2,
	sc.report_month_end_date as Report_MonthEnd_Date,
	coalesce(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + coalesce(co.carried_over_hours, 0) as leave_entitlement_hrs,
	coalesce(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0) as leave_taken_hrs,
	round((coalesce(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + coalesce(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - coalesce(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0)  - coalesce(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)), 2) as leave_remaining_hours,
	coalesce(round(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 2), 0) as leave_remaining_prorata_hours
	--,coalesce(round((coalesce(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + coalesce(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - coalesce(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0)  - coalesce(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)) * (sc.hourly_rate) * (1 + p.Total), 2),0.0) as cost_untaken_al
from odw_standardised_db.hr_saphr h
	left join staff_cost sc on h.pers_no = sc.staff_number
	left join carried_over co on sc.staff_number = co.staff_number
	left join leave_taken lt on sc.staff_number = lt.staff_number
	left join odw_standardised_db.bis_pension_ernic_rates p on sc.grade = p.Grade
where 
	right(cast(cast(sc.report_month_end_date as date) as varchar(10)),5) in ('01-31','02-28','02-29','03-31','04-30','05-31','06-30','07-31','08-31','09-30','10-31','11-30','12-31')
